column4: im trying to delete all the folders in a certain folder under a certain size. unfortunately, nautilus only shows folder size in terms of file count, not in terms of total item size. how should i go about this?
is there a setting i can change in nautilus?

the reason that Nautilus doesn't show the size of the folders is that the folders need to be scanned to determine that. Disk Usage Analyzer (baobab) will do that scanning for you, as will the du command.
i did use disk usage analyzer, though.
